lead_paragraph: Lawsuits accused the bureau of failing to thoroughly check Mr. Roof’s background before he killed nine people at Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church in June 2015.

headline.print_headline: Survivors of Charleston Church Attack Sue F.B.I.
headline.main: Survivors of Charleston Attack Sue F.B.I., Citing Errors That Let Dylann Roof Buy Gun

snippet: Lawsuits accused the bureau of failing to thoroughly check Mr. Roof’s background before he killed nine people at Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church in June 2015....
abstract: Survivors of 2015 shooting at Emmanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church in Charleston, SC, file lawsuit against FBI, claiming negligence of agency allowed shooter Dylann Storm Roof, who had prior drug arrest, to purchase gun he used in attack.
